entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 09:30 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
